Add Font Name Records to name Table API for C#, ASP.NET Apps
item.description: Aspose.Font for .NET 22.4 Download  Support Forum  File Details Downloads: 6 File Size: 4.2 MB Date Added: : 4 weeks ago [4/22/2022] Release Noteshttps://releases.aspose.com/font/net/release-notes/2022/aspose-font-for-net-22-4-release-notes/ File Details Support for .NET 6.0 From this release the support for .NET 6.0 target framework has been added. Add Font Metadata to name Table This release offers the support for adding Name Records to the TrueType font table name.

item.title: OTF to TTF | OpenType to TrueType | API for C#, ASP.NET Apps
item.description: Aspose.Font for .NET 22.9 Download  Support Forum  File Details Downloads: 1 File Size: 4.2MB Date Added: 15/9/2022 Release Noteshttps://releases.aspose.com/font/net/release-notes/2022/aspose-font-for-net-22-9-release-notes/ File Details Support for OTF to TTF Font Conversion Introduced the font conversion support from OTF (OpenType Font) format to TTF (TrueType Font) format. Supports Over 1 Million Glyph Count Previously the supported Glyph count was 6551, which has now been enhanced to over 1 (one) million in the TrueType font conversion.

item.title: API for C#, ASP.NET Apps: Supports Kerning Pairs in SVG Font
item.description: Aspose.Font for .NET 23.2 Download  Support Forum  File Details Downloads: 1 File Size: 4.23MB Date Added: 15/2/2023 Release Noteshttps://releases.aspose.com/font/net/release-notes/2023/aspose-font-for-net-23-2-release-notes/ DescriptionIt contains Aspose.Font for .NET 23.2 release File Details Support for kerning pairs in SVG converter This version of the API release brings to you the support of kerning pairs in SVG converter. Kerning pairs in SVG are pairs of letters that are spaced closer together than they would be if normal letter spacing were applied, which is useful for creating a visually appealing, even and less cluttered text.

item.title: C# .NET Font API: Change Truetype Font Chracter Set Encoding
item.description: Aspose.Font for .NET 23.3 Download  Support Forum  File Details Downloads: 1 File Size: 4.25MB Date Added: 31/3/2023 Release Noteshttps://releases.aspose.com/font/net/release-notes/2023/aspose-font-for-net-23-3-release-notes/ DescriptionIt contains Aspose.Font for .NET 23.3 release. File Details Change Truetype Font Chracter Set Encoding This release of API has added the feature of converting TrueType fonts using a specific character set. It means that using this Font API you can change the encoding of a TrueType font to another character set.

item.title: Reliable & Secure Font API for C# Apps | .NET Standard 2.0
item.description: Aspose.Font for .NET 23.5 Download  Support Forum  File Details Downloads: 1 File Size: 5.51MB Date Added: 31/5/2023 Release Noteshttps://releases.aspose.com/font/net/release-notes/2023/aspose-font-for-net-23-5-release-notes/ DescriptionIt contains Aspose.Font for .NET 23.5 release File Details .NET Standard 2.0 Support This API release offers the .NET Standard 2.0 (.NET Core 2.0/2.1) support. It enables this Font manipulation API to help C#, ASP.NET developers to build more flexible and powerful apps to work with the various fonts such as; True Type Font (TTF), True Type Collections (TTC), Scalable Computer Fonts (OpenType), Web Open Font Format (WOFF), Web Open Font Format version 2.

item.title: Text Rendering Fix for Type1 Font Glyph ID, C# .NET Font API
item.description: Aspose.Font for .NET 23.7 Download  Support Forum  File Details Downloads: 1 File Size: 5.5MB Date Added: 13/7/2023 Release Noteshttps://releases.aspose.com/font/net/release-notes/2023/aspose-font-for-net-23-7-release-notes/ DescriptionIt contains Aspose.Font for .NET 23.7 release. File Details Fetch Glyph ID for Specific Type1 Font It was observed that, there was an issue with a specific Type1 font that caused it to return an incorrect glyph id. This could lead to text being rendered incorrectly, especially for complex characters or languages.

item.title: C# .NET API CFF Font Text Render Fix IndexOutOfRangeException
item.description: Aspose.Font for .NET 23.8 Download  Support Forum  File Details Downloads: 1 File Size: 5.51MB Date Added: 11/8/2023 Release Noteshttps://releases.aspose.com/font/net/release-notes/2023/aspose-font-for-net-23-8-release-notes/ DescriptionIt contains Aspose.Font for .NET 23.8 release. File Details CFF Font Text Rendering Fix A bug in the C# .NET API has been fixed. The bug was causing an IndexOutOfRangeException to be thrown when the MeasureString() method was used to measure the size of a string for a CFF font.
